articles.title: Gift from Algerian President
articles.content:
Gift  from Algerian President
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Abdelaziz Bouteflika, President of Algeria, on the occasion of the new year Juche 99 (2010).
					 The gift was handed to an official of the DPRK embassy in China on Dec. 24.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and congratulatory letter by the economic and commercial councilors' corps here on the occasion of the New Year.
					 They were conveyed to an official concerned by Wang Zhilin, economic and commercial councilor of the Chinese embassy here who is doyen of the corps, on Dec. 28.

articles.title: Over 120 More Scenic Spots Discovered in Mt. Myohyang
articles.content:
Over 120 More Scenic Spots Discovered in Mt. Myohyang
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Over 120 more scenic spots have been discovered in Mt. Myohyang, one of the famous mountains in Korea.
					 A team of experts from Kim Il Sung University, the Cultural Relics Conservation Guidance Bureau, the Mt. Myohyang Beauty Spots Management Office and Korean Cultural Preservation Agency, has recently made an on-the-spot survey of Sangwon, Manphok, Chonthae and Chilsong Ravines and Piro Peak of the mountain.
					
					 They have newly discovered waterfalls, ponds, fantastic rocks, peaks and so on.
					
					 Of them 21 large waterfalls, five ponds and 21 fantastic rocks were given names according to their features and shapes through discussions with archaeologists, linguists, historians and geographers.
					
					 Typical of the waterfalls are Idan, Samsim, Samhyongje, Samdan, Hapsu, Sipidan (12 stages), Kangson, Ryongsu and Aegi in Chonthae, Chilsong and Manphok Ravines.
					
					 The five ponds are Sangsin in Sangwon Ravine, Tanphung in Chonthae Ravine, Samchon on Piro Peak and Mangyong and Unsil in Chilsong Ravine.
					
					 Among the rocks are Janggun Rock, Puri Rock, Taegobuk Rock and Korae Rock in Sangwon Ravine, Hama Rock and Twin Rocks with a path in between in Manphok Ravine, Koemyon Rock in Chonthae Ravine, Som Rock in Chilsong Ravine and Songsae Rock, Sokgabonggobuk Rock, Posot Rock, Chonthaebongsaja Rock, Wonmanbong Three-storied-pagoda-shaped Rock, Wonmanbong Dolmen-shaped Rock, Toksuri Rock, Chomsongdae Rock and Pirobong Diving-tower-shaped Rock in Piro Peak.
					
					 Before the survey, the number of the registered scenic spots in the mountain had totaled over 80.

articles.title: Prelude to Prosperity of Songun Korea
articles.content:
Prelude to Prosperity of Songun Korea
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Tremendous achievements have been made in Songun Korea in Juche 98 (2009) when the Korean people's dreams have come true one by one in a drive for a great revolutionary upsurge.
					 The "Huichon speed", a new Chollima speed, has been created in the construction of the Huichon Power Station and the Korean people's long-desired building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation has become definitely possible with the backing of armed forces.
					
					 Conspicuous are signs of prosperity which have appeared in the country along with evening galas of firecrackers giving the people a hope of great happiness.
					
					 The successful launch of the second artificial satellite was a great event providing solid foundations for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 On the basis of ultramodern science, monumental structures of which the Korean people can stand proud in the eyes of the world have taken their shape throughout the country, changing its appearance drastically.
					
					 Wonsan City decorated with electric lights, face-lifted Manpho City, the Samilpho Specialties Factory and the Taedonggang Tile Factory deserve the admiration of people.
					
					 The February 8 Vinalon Complex has been updated to boost the production of various chemical goods conducive to the people's livelihood and a cotton farm, goat farm, Sokjong Pig Farm and Sokjong Factory of Soy-sauced Sliced Vegetables have been built to render services to people in their daily life.
					
					 Well-furnished Majon Hotel, well-built Mansudae Street, Miru Plain waterway, a lot of monumental edifices and the large-sized Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm are also admired by people.
					
					 All the achievements, which have been made under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, constitute a prelude to a great prosperity of Songun Korea that will turn into a great, prosperous and powerful nation in the not very distant future.

articles.title: Ambition of Japan to Grab Tok Islet Flailed
articles.content:
Ambition of Japan to Grab Tok Islets Flailed
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- According to the information provided by the Japanese Geographical Institute recently to a foreign correspondent, all of the 200,000-300,000 maps published in Japan every year had Tok Islets (Takeshima) marked in the same color as its territory.
					 A spokesman for the institute said satellite photos are used for marking the islets as Japanese are barred from landing on them and making a necessary measurement at present and the issue of using a modern geodetic method is now under study. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This indicates that Japan's moves to grab other's territory has reached a more shameless and undisguised phase. 
					
					 Japan's move to seize Tok Islets is a blatant infringement upon the dignity and sovereignty of the Korean nation. 
					
					 There is neither reason nor justification for Japan to raise a claim to Tok Islets as they are an inviolable part of the territory of Korea. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' open marking of Tok Islets on their maps as part of their "territory" patently proves once again that they are so brazen-faced as to stoop to anything to meet their purpose of territorial expansion.
					
					 No matter how absurdly Japan may insist that other's land belongs to it, Tokyo can never bring them under its control. It is evil disposition and inveterate bad habit of Japan to tell lies and make fabrications and perpetrate invasion and plunder.
					
					 It is the unchangeable brigandish ambition of Japs to covet other's territory.
					
					 They give Japanese name to the islets of other country before depriving them of the designation of the continental shelf in the waters off them and seeking to put the whole area under their domination in the end.
					
					 Herein lies the vicious and dangerous nature of Japan's moves to grab other's territory. 
					
					 But such brazen-faced artifice of Japan is no longer workable in this bright world.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to immediately drop such foolish bid, bearing deep in mind that the world people remain vigilant against the ugly serpent of militarism reemerging through their wild ambition for territorial expansion.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Censured for Bedeviling Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Censured for Bedeviling Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Unification of south Korea presented "a proposal for changing the basic plan for developing the south-north relations" to the "Grand National Party" some time ago. According to this, the plan contains a new phraseology that the "south-north economic cooperation should be boosted in linkage with the nuclear issue of the north".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This indicates that the south Korean authorities are seeking to drop a check-bar on the process for improving the inter-Korean relations at any cost under the pretext of the nuclear issue of the north quite contrary to the aspiration of the compatriots and the trend of the times.
					
					 It is the height of sarcasm for the south Korean rulers to talk this or that about the nuclear issue of the north and its nuclear deterrent without any proper understanding of the essence of the issue and the characteristics of the deterrent. 
					
					 Their assertion that the improvement of the inter-Korean relations is delayed due to the nuclear deterrent of the north is prompted by the prejudice caused by their behavior of toeing the line of foreign forces and it is a revelation of their inveterate conception of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have already suffered a lot due to the unreasonable ruckus kicked up by the south Korean authorities to derail the cooperation over the nuclear issue.
					
					 The above-said plan that links the nuclear issue with the inter-Korean relations is nothing but an anti-reunification "bill" aimed at scuttling all the projects for inter-Korean cooperation and exchange over the nuclear issue, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 They had better plainly call the plan "a plan for suspending everything" instead of advertising it as "a development plan." 
					
					 The improvement of the inter-Korean relations is required by the times and an urgent task for national unity and reunification. It is an unpardonable act of treachery to bedevil the inter-Korean relations, groundlessly raising a hue and cry over the nuclear issue in disregard of the hard fact.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to behave themselves, mindful that if they persist in their moves to hamstring the efforts to warm the inter-Korean relations, obsessed with the wild ambition to pressurize the north "to dismantle its nukes first," they will have to bitterly regret for their wrong.

articles.title: Revocation of Confrontational Policy towards DPRK Called for
articles.content:
Revocation of Confrontational Policy towards DPRK Called for
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- If the south Korean authorities obstruct the improvement of the inter-Korean relations persistently insisting on their confrontational policy towards the DPRK in negligence of the desire of the times and the demand of the nation, they will only meet isolation and destruction, Rodong Sinmun observes this in a signed article on Monday.
					 The south Korean authorities challenged the trend of the times persistently pursuing the confrontational policy towards fellow countrymen this year, too, as they did last year, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The confrontational policy towards the DPRK persisted by the south Korean authorities is a clear manifestation of their concept of hostility toward fellow countrymen.
					
					 To antagonize fellow countrymen is a treacherous attitude regarding the nation of the same blood as target of confrontation and aggression, not as parties to reconcile and unite.
					
					 Confrontation and military clash between the north and the south would be unavoidable if the south Korean authorities seek to do harm to fellow countrymen, regarding them as enemy for the mere reason that they have differing ideology and system.
					
					 The confrontational policy of the south Korean authorities is the main source causing antipathy and discord among Koreans and barring the inter-Korean relations from being developed as it stokes bitterness toward fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is self-evident that the relationship between the north and the south can never make smooth progress unless south Korea makes a fundamental switchover in its treacherous "policy towards the north," which regards fellow countrymen as enemy and aggravates the inter-Korean confrontation.
					
					 It is impossible to achieve national reconciliation and unity as well as the north-south cooperation and exchange nor is it possible to expect development of the national reunification movement as long as the south Korean authorities are allowed to keep pursuing the "policy towards the north," which obstructs the improvement of the national reunification movement against the desire of people for reunification through alliance with the north.
					
					 It is a mockery and deception of the public opinion at home and abroad demanding the improvement of the north-south relations for the south Korean ruling forces to stubbornly insist on the traitorous "policy towards the north" and make a fuss about the so-called "dialogue" and "sincerity."
					
					 All the Koreans hope to see the relationship between the north and the south to make a fresh development as genuine relations between fellow countrymen. To this end, it is necessary for south Korea to have anachronistic "policy towards the north" certainly withdrawn as it pushed the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe.

articles.title: Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Ten odd civic and public organizations of south Korea including the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the (south) Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy called a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 24, urging the authorities to release the prisoners of conscience.
					 At the conference speakers noted that the authorities are nowadays attempting to grant "special pardon" to big businessmen and privileged persons who have been imprisoned for their wrongdoings.
					
					 The authorities are busy with patronizing the big businessmen and privileged class who have exploited the common people, though they had committed themselves not to "pardon" the offenders who perpetrated wrongdoings, until recently, they pointed out.
					
					 There are many prisoners of conscience in jail, including reunification champions, Ryongsan evacuees and unionists, who have been detained on unreasonable charges by dint of the evil law against reunification, democracy and human rights, they said, accusing the authorities of disregarding their release.
					
					 They strongly demanded that the "government" stop the unreasonable "special pardon" at once and set free the prisoners of conscience.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Insulting Victims of Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Insulting Victims of Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Yun Mi Hyang, permanent representative of the south Korean Council for Solution of the Volunteers' Corps, issued a statement on Dec. 24 accusing the Japanese authorities of shamelessly insulting the victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 It was disclosed that the Japanese authorities recently decided to pay 99 yen to the victims of the "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army under the name of compensating for the withdrawal of welfare annuity, greatly infuriating and stunning public circles, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 It is something resentful that the lawsuit raised by the victims in demand of the payment of the allowance was handled eleven years later, but it was more intolerable that the Japanese authorities so brazen-facedly insulted them by proposing the payment of so petty amount of money to them. 
					
					 Japan should admit as early as possible the crimes it committed in the past and make reparation for them without delay. 
					
					 Japan should immediately apologize for its recent insult to the victims, in particular, and take steps to make reparation for the mental and physical pain inflicted upon them and restore their honor, the statement urged.
					
					 The victims and members of civic and public organizations representing different circles held a press conference in front of the Japanese embassy in Seoul at which they demanded the Japanese authorities apologize for trifling them again and declared they would not accept the above-mentioned payment.

articles.title: Demolition of Concrete Wall Demanded
articles.content:
Demolition of Concrete Wall Demanded
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Brazil-Korea Friendship Association released a statement on Dec. 21 demanding the demolition of the concrete wall.
					 The statement recalled that the south Korean authorities built the concrete wall under the patronage of the U.S. seeking to divide Korea into two parts for an indefinite period.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration make it possible to pull down the concrete wall at an early date and realize the desire of all Koreans in the north and the south for national reconciliation and cooperation, peace and prosperity, it stressed.
					
					 The statement strongly urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to demolish the concrete wall, saying that the association, together with the peace-loving progressive people, expresses solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Meeting of Nigerian Juche Idea Study Organization Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Nigerian Juche Idea Study Organization Held
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea took place in Abuja on Dec. 22.
					 At the meeting M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the committee, reviewed this year's work of the organization and announced its action plan for 2010.
					
					 The committee decided to conduct such diverse activities as lecture and seminar for deeply grasping the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and widely studying and disseminating the Juche idea, the Songun idea.

articles.title: DPRK Significant Day Marked
articles.content:
DPRK Significant Day Marked
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism published its bulletin "The twinkling star over the sky of Korea" on Dec. 21 to mark the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin in an article captioned "The birth of everlasting star" introduced the undying feats Kim Jong Suk performed for the country and revolution, noting that she, who is anti-Japanese heroine and a comrade-in-arms most faithful to President Kim Il Sung, was born on Dec. 24, 1917.
					
					 It said that the Korean people held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the KPA supreme commander on Dec. 24, 1991 and that he is providing a sure guarantee for the victorious advance of building a great prosperous and powerful nation by applying the principle of giving priority to the military affairs in the Korean revolution and socialist construction.
					
					 In an article titled "Songun is guarantee for peace and security" the bulletin noted that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the army and people of the DPRK to the struggle for defending socialism with his original Songun policy.
					
					 If the U.S. dares provoke the Korean people working to build a thriving nation, it will be bound to face a due punishment, it said, stressing that the increased defence capability of the DPRK serves for world peace.
					
					 In an article entitled "The DPRK, thriving nation" the bulletin said that Kim Jong Il's field guidance encouraged the Korean people to make another leap forward on all fronts of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Friendship Society Norway-Korea and the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, too, issued bulletins on Dec. 22 and 23 in praise of the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and the personality of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu, as a great person.

articles.title: Souvenir Picture Taken in Front of Heroine's Bust
articles.content:
Souvenir Picture Taken in Front of Heroine's Bust
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong with officials on a day of December Juche 71 (1982).
					 Looking at busts of anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and recollecting their names and merits one by one, he stopped in front of the bust of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 After having his eyes glued to her bust for a while, looking back upon her life, he suggested to the officials having a picture taken in front of her bust.
					
					 The officials stepped up to him to pose for a picture. The moment when a cameraman was going to press the shutter, however, the President asked him in a low voice if the bust was seen well.
					
					 The cameraman answered in the affirmative, feeling tears welling up in his eyes.
					
					 From that day the 65th birth anniversary of the heroine was only a few days off.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il ve funcion artistica de Comandancia de Fuerzas Maritimas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il ve funcion artistica de Comandancia de Fuerzas Maritimas
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con oficiales y soldados del EPC presencio la funcion del Conjunto Artistico de las Fuerzas Maritimas del EPC con motivo del Dia de la Constitucion Socialista.
					El Conjunto Artistico puso en la escena la serie de canciones "General y marineros", el baile "Manana de la salida del puerto", el coro masculino "Que conquiste la tecnica de punta" y otras piezas.
					
					A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes demostraron bien el invencible poderio del heroico EPC, crecido como poderoso ejercito sin rival en el regazo del amor del General, insigne Comandante simpar, la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los militares del EPC dispuesto a defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion y llevar a feliz termino con armas la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los artistas del Conjunto Artistico hayan ofrecido la magnifica funcion llena del espiritu revolucionario de los militares y evaluo altamente los exitos de la lucha de ellos quienes infunden a los uniformados la fe en la cierta victoria, el optimismo, la valencia y el espiritu combativo de aniquilar a los enemigos.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los artistas militares libraran con energia las revolucionarias y combativas actividades de propaganda artistica y estimularan al ejercito y el pueblo a la sagrada lucha por defender el regimen socialista, noble conquista lograda con la sangre por el pueblo coreano.
					
					Le acompanaron el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Won Hong y Hyon Chol Hae, el coronel general Jong Myong Do, comandante de las Fuerzas Maritimas del EPC y otros miembros directivos del ejercito, el secretario del CC del PTC Choe Thae Bok, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Pak Nam Gi y Kim Yang Gon y otros cuadros directivos del CC del Partido.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de Abdelaziz Bouteflika
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de Abdelaziz Bouteflika
  Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera el presidente de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, Abdelaziz Bouteflika con motivo del Ano Nuevo 99 (2010) de la Era Juche.
					  El presente fue entregado el dia 24 a un funcionario de la embajada coreana en China.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta del cuerpo de consejeros
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta del cuerpo de consejeros
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el cesto de flores y la carta de felicitacion que le dirigiera el Cuerpo de Consejeros Economicos y Comerciales acreditados en Corea en ocasion del Ano Nuevo.
					Los entrego el dia 28 a un funcionario coreano el consejero economico y comercial de la Embajada de la Republica Popular China, Wang Zhilin, quien preside ese cuerpo.

articles.title: Preludio de gran prosperidad de Corea del Songun
articles.content:
Preludio de gran prosperidad de Corea del Songun
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El 98 (2009) de la Era Juche es un ano de victoria en que fueron creados los milagros para realizar el ideal en Corea del Songun.
					En el proceso de la marcha de gran auge revolucionario se realizaron uno a otro los ideales y aspiraciones que el pueblo coreano guardaba durante largo tiempo.
					
					En el presente ano fue creada la nueva velocidad de Chollima, o sea, "velocidad de Huichon", que conmueve a todo el mundo, y con el poderio del Songun se extendio en la realidad el paraiso de felicidad, sueno de la gran potencia prospera a que deseaba el pueblo coreano.
					
					De veras son emocionantes los sintomas de prosperidad producidos en esta tierra junto con el fuego artificial que promete a nuestro pueblo las felicidades de todas formas.
					
					El lanzamiento exitoso del segundo satelite artificial fue un milagro que echo el eterno cimiento capaz de manifestar el poderio nacional de gran potencia prospera.
					
					Por doquier del pais se irguieron ininterrumpidamente las creaciones que pueda envidiar el mundo, valiendose de la tecnica de punta, gracias a lo cual se cambio radicalmente la fisonomia del pais.
					
					El maravilloso mar de luz de la ciudad de Wonsan, el cambio de la ciudad de Manpho, la Fabrica de Productos Especiales Samilpho y la Fabrica de Azulejos de Taedonggang causaron la admiracion a las personas.
					
					Fue reconstruido el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero que produce muchos articulos quimicos de diversos generos que contribuiran a la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					   Dan gran alegria a los visitantes la Granja de Algodon, la Granja de Cabras y la Granja Porcina de Sokjong, que abren un vasto horizonte a la solucion de problema del vestido, alimento y alojamiento, y la Fabrica de Jang-ajji de Sokjong que procesa los Jang-ajji (hortalizas aderezadas en salsa de soya), platos tradicionales de la nacion coreana.
					
					El Hotel Majon de nivel supremo, la maravillosa avenida Mansudae, el canal de la llanura Miru, numerosos edificios monumentales, y la Granja Fruticola Combinada Taedonggang de gran tamano dan alegria a las personas.
					
					Tales hechos orgullosos devienen cuadros historicos logrados por la guia del Dirigente       Kim Jong Il y, al mismo tiempo, el preludio de gran prosperidad de la Corea del Songun que en el futuro no lejano se convertira en la gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se refiere a cambio de politica contra RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun se refiere a cambio de politica contra RPDC
 Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Si las autoridades surcoreanas desprecian la aspiracion de la epoca y la demanda de la nacion y obstaculizan la mejora de las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea insistiendo continuamente en la politica de enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, no podran evitar el aislamiento y la ruina.
					  Tambien en  el presente ano al igual que en el pasado, las autoridades surcoreanas desafiaron la corriente de la epoca persiguiendo invariablemente la politica de confrontacion con los connacionales.  
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 28 y continua:
					
					  Esta politica de las autoridades surcoreanas es la clara prueba del concepto hostil a los connacionales.
					
					  La enemistad a los connacionales es la actitud antinacional que considera la nacion homogenea de misma sangre como no objeto de la reconciliacion y unidad sino el de confrontacion y agresion.
					
					　Si ellas intentan danar a los connacionales considerandolos como enemigos por motivo de las  diferencias de las ideas y regimenes, no pueden evitar el enfrentamiento y choque militar entre el Norte y el Sur. 
					
					  La politica de confrontacion anti-RPDC de las autoridades surcoreanas es la causa para fomentar la antipatia y discordia en el interior de la nacion e impedir el mejoramiento de las relaciones N-S hostilizando a los connacionales.
					
					  Mientras que en el Sur de Corea no se cambia  radicalmente la "politica sobre el Norte" antinacional que hostiliza a los connacionales y agrava el estado de confrontacion, nunca se pueden mejorar justamente las relaciones N-S.
					
					  Al dejar intacta la "politica sobre el Norte" de las autoridades surcoreanas que impiden la aspiracion de los habitantes a la reunificacion en alianza con el Norte y frenan el desarrollo del movimiento de la reunificacion de la patria, no habran la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion, la cooperacion y el intercambio entre el Norte y el Sur ni el desarrollo del movimiento de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  Las fuerzas gobernantes del Sur de Corea hablan mucho del "dialogo" y la "veracidad" insistiendo persistentemente en la antinacional "politica sobre el Norte", lo cual es la burla y engano sobre la opinion publica interna y externa que demanda la mejora de las relaciones N-S.
					
					   Ahora todos los coreanos desean que las relaciones N-S desarrollen nuevamente al convertirse en las verdaderas relaciones entre los connacionales.
					
					  Para eso, es preciso que en el Sur de Corea sea abolida sin falta la anacronica "politica sobre el Norte" que causo el fracaso de las relaciones N-S.
